# 1. Load Data Set
```{r}
malaria <- read_csv("data/malaria.csv")
malaria
```

```{r}
malaria %>% clean_names()
```

# 2. Make data tidy and store as a new object
```{r}
malaria %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols=starts_with("malaria_rdt"),
               names_to = "age_class",
               values_to = "cases")
```
